title: Did Marlène Schiappa promote anthroposophy and alternative medicine?
author: Anonym
description: THE VERIFICATION - The Minister Delegate for Citizenship recorded, at the beginning of October, a podcast in the company of Anne Ghesquière, close to anthroposophy, an esoteric current based on the thought of the Austrian occultist Rudolf Steiner.
cleaned_text: THE QUESTION THE QUESTION . Stupor in the small world of the fight against sectarian aberrations. At the beginning of October, the Minister for Citizenship, Marlène Schiappa, took part in the Métamorphose podcast , presented by Anne Ghesquière, author and editor in the field of well-being. This jack-of-all-trades, founder of the media Femininbio, turns out to be close to followers of alternative medicine, and especially to anthroposophy, an esoteric current based on the thought of the Austrian occultist Rudolf Steiner. The movement is closely followed by the Interministerial Mission for Vigilance and the Fight against Sectarian Drifts (Miviludes), overseen by Marlène Schiappa since 2020. By accepting this invitation, has the Minister promoted these movements? See also Cosmic forces, esoteric rituals and supernatural beings: what is hidden behind "biodynamic" wines CHECKS CHECKS . On October 2, The Extractor, a collective informing about the dangers of " pseudo-alternatives in terms of health and food " and sectarian aberrations, spotted a publication on Anne Ghesquière's Instagram account.
